My full name is Conrado Patricio Goze Ambrosio, I usually go by Pat. I currently reside in Makati, Metro Manila, Philippines.

Interests

Reading. I like to read a mixture of longform journalism, design, and technology opinion pieces. Notable sources are Longform.org, A List Apart, M.G. Siegler, Paul Graham, Jason Santa Maria.

Typography. Less about font faces, and more about practical and good application. Heavily influenced by Matthew Butterick.

Design. I tend to look at design as an experience aside from a visual construct, I draw influence and inspiration from IA.net and 99% Invisible.

Photography. Appreciation and practical application. I learned from shooting with film using a Twin Lens Reflex camera.

Writing. It is something I think I can be passionate in and want to learn more about.
